ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•° TTTï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæœ‰ TTT ç»„æ•°æ®ã€‚

$65535 $è¿˜å¤šï¼Œè¾“å‡ºâ€œZenMeZheMeDuoâ€.

solution

é¦–å…ˆæ˜¯ä¸€å †ç‰¹åˆ¤ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºæ˜¯æ­£æ•´æ•°è§£ï¼‰ï¼Œåœ¨ä»£ç é‡Œä¼šä½“ç°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸è®²ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥çœ‹æ€æ ·æ±‚å‡ºæ­£æ•´æ•°è§£æ•°é‡ã€‚é¦–å…ˆè¿›è¡Œæ‰“è¡¨è§‚å¯Ÿ(è¿™é‡Œæ‹¿ax+by=5,a=3,b=2ax+by=5,a=3,b=2ax+by=5,a=3,b=2ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­)

å‘ç°ä»ä¸€ä¸ªè§£åˆ°ç›¸é‚»ä¸€ä¸ªè§£xxxå¢åŠ ï¼ˆæˆ–å‡å°‘ï¼‰äº†lcm(a,b)a\frac{lcm(a,b)}{a}alcm(a,b)â€‹,yyyå¢åŠ ï¼ˆæˆ–å‡å°‘ï¼‰äº†lcm(a,b)b\frac{lcm(a,b)}{b}blcm(a,b)â€‹.é‚£ä¹ˆè®¾sa=âˆ£lcm(a,b)aâˆ£sa=|\frac{lcm(a,b)}{a}|sa=âˆ£alcm(a,b)â€‹âˆ£,sb=âˆ£lcm(a,b)bâˆ£sb=|\frac{lcm(a,b)}{b}|sb=âˆ£blcm(a,b)â€‹âˆ£,å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ç»„è§£ä¸ºxâ€²,yâ€²x',y'xâ€²,yâ€²,å¯å¾—x=saâˆ—k+xâ€²,y=âˆ’sbâˆ—k+yâ€²x=sa*k+x',y=-sb*k+y'x=saâˆ—k+xâ€²,y=âˆ’sbâˆ—k+yâ€²,ç”»å‡ºæ¥ä¹‹åå°±è¿™ä¸ªæ ·å­ï¼š

æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æ±‚å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªé›¶ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´æœ‰å¤šå°‘æ•´æ•°ç‚¹å³å¯ã€‚

ä»£ç 

//æ‰¾ä¸€ç»„ç‰¹è§£ç„¶åç”¨åŒæ­¥ç›´çº¿åˆ¤æ–­å‡ºæ¥
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}
inline void write(int x)
{
    if(x>65535)
    {
        puts("ZenMeZheMeDuo");
        return ;
    }
    short s[20],len=0;
    if(!x) putchar('0');
    if(x<0) putchar('-'),x=-x;
    while(x) s[++len]=x%10,x/=10;
    while(len) putchar('0'|s[len--]);
    putchar(10);
}
inline int gcd(int x,int y)
{
    return y?gcd(y,x%y):x;
}
int T;
int a,b,c;
bool check()//ç‰¹åˆ¤ä»¬
{
    if((a<=0&&b<=0&&c>0)||(a>=0&&b>=0&&c<0))
    {//æ— æ³•å½¢æˆæ­£æ•´æ•°è§£
        puts("0");
        return 1;
    }
    if(c%gcd(a,b))//æ— è§£
    {
        puts("0");
        return 1;
    }
    if((!a&&b)||(!b&&a))
    {//å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¯0å°±éšä¾¿çå–æ‰€ä»¥æ˜¯æ— æ•°ç»„è§£
        puts("ZenMeZheMeDuo");
        return 1;
    }
    if((a<0&&b>0)||(a>0&&b<0)||(!a&&!b&&!c)) 
    {//ä¼šå½¢æˆæ— æ•°å¤šç»„è§£
        puts("ZenMeZheMeDuo");
        return 1;
    }
    if(a+b==c)//åªä¼šæœ‰ä¸€ç»„æ­£æ•´æ•°è§£
    {
        puts("1");
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}

int x,y;
inline void exgcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(!b)
    {
        x=1,y=0;
        return ;
    }
    exgcd(b,a%b);
    int z=x;
    x=y,y=z-y*(a/b);
}

signed main()
{
    T=read();
    while(T--)
    {
        a=read(),b=read(),c=read();

        if(check()) continue;
        
        exgcd(a,b);
        x*=(c/gcd(a,b)),y*=(c/gcd(a,b));
        int Lcm=a*b/gcd(a,b);
        int sa=abs(Lcm/a),sb=abs(Lcm/b);
        sb=-sb;
        bool dira=(sa>0),dirb=(sb>0);//æ–œç‡æ˜¯æ­£è¿˜æ˜¯è´Ÿ
        double la=(double)(-x/(sa*1.0)),lb=(double)(-y/(sb*1.0));
        //ä¸¤ä¸ªé›¶ç‚¹
        if((la>lb&&!dira&&dirb)||(la<lb&&dira&&!dirb))
        {
            if(la>lb) swap(la,lb);
            int ta=((int)la>la?(int)la:(int)la+1);
            //æ‰¾å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”å®ƒå¤§çš„æ•´æ•°
            int tb=((int)lb<lb?(int)lb:(int)lb-1);
            //æ‰¾å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”å®ƒå°çš„
            write(tb-ta+1);
        }
    }

    return 0;
}

2.æ´›è°·P3177 æ ‘ä¸ŠæŸ“è‰²

P3177

solution

æ˜¾ç„¶æ˜¯dp.

è®¾çŠ¶æ€fi,jf_{i,j}fi,jâ€‹è¡¨ç¤ºåœ¨ä»¥iiiä¸ºæ ¹çš„å­æ ‘é‡Œé€‰jjjä¸ªé»‘ç‚¹çš„æœ€å¤§æ”¶ç›Šï¼Œè½¬ç§»å°±åƒæ ‘å½¢èƒŒåŒ…ï¼Œä¸åŒçš„æ˜¯åŠ çš„ä¸æ˜¯ä»·å€¼è€Œæ˜¯å½“å‰è¿™æ¡è¾¹çš„è´¡çŒ®ã€‚

æ³¨æ„æ ‘å½¢èƒŒåŒ…ä¸€å®šè¦ä»ä¸Šå¾€ä¸‹åšå•Šå•Šå•Šå•Šï¼ï¼ï¼

code

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
const int MAXN=2005;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}
inline void write(int x)
{
    short s[20],len=0;
    if(!x) putchar('0');
    if(x<0) putchar('-'),x=-x;
    while(x) s[++len]=x%10,x/=10;
    while(len) putchar('0'|s[len--]);
    putchar(10);
}

int n,m;
int head[MAXN];
struct EDGE
{
    int from,to;
    int val;
    int next;
}edge[MAXN<<1];
int edge_cnt=1;
void add_edge(int fr,int to,int val)
{
    edge[++edge_cnt].from=fr;
    edge[edge_cnt].to=to;
    edge[edge_cnt].val=val;
    edge[edge_cnt].next=head[fr];
    head[fr]=edge_cnt;
}

int siz[MAXN];
int f[MAXN][MAXN];
void dfs(int x,int fath)
{
    siz[x]=1;
    f[x][0]=f[x][1]=0;
    for(int i=head[x];i;i=edge[i].next)
    {
        int y=edge[i].to;
        if(y==fath) continue;
        dfs(y,x);
        siz[x]+=siz[y];
        //è¿™ä¸ªå¯ä»¥çœ‹åšé›†èµ„,å½“å‰ç‚¹çš„å…¶ä»–å­æ ‘å‡ºj-kä¸ª,å­æ ‘yå‡ºkä¸ª
        for(int j=min(siz[x],m);j>=0;j--)
            for(int k=0;k<=min(siz[y],j);k++)
            {
                if(f[x][j-k]==-1) continue;
                int delt=edge[i].val*(k*(m-k)+(siz[y]-k)*(n-m-siz[y]+k));
                f[x][j]=max(f[x][j],f[x][j-k]+f[y][k]+delt);
            }
    }
}
signed main()
{
    n=read(),m=read();
    for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
        int u=read(),v=read(),va=read();
        add_edge(u,v,va),add_edge(v,u,va);
    }
    memset(f,-1,sizeof(f));
    dfs(1,0);
    
    write(f[1][m]);

    return 0;
}

3å’Œ4

5.æ— é¢˜

è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼

ç»™å®šL,R,x,yL,R,x,yL,R,x,yï¼Œæ±‚ [L,R][L,R][L,R]å†…æœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªæ•´æ•° aaa æ»¡è¶³å°† aaa å†™æˆåè¿›åˆ¶åï¼Œä»é«˜ä½åˆ°ä½ä½ä¸å­˜åœ¨ä¸¤ä¸ªè¿ç»­çš„æ•°ä½æ°å¥½æ˜¯ xyâ€¾\overline{xy}xyâ€‹ã€‚

ä¾‹å¦‚åœ¨æ•° 123451234512345 ä¸­ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨çš„ä¸Šè¿°è¿ç»­æ•°ä½æœ‰ 12â€¾\overline{12}12ï¼Œ23â€¾\overline{23}23ï¼Œ34â€¾\overline{34}34ï¼Œ45â€¾\overline{45}45ï¼›åœ¨æ•° 123121231212312 ä¸­ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨çš„ä¸Šè¿°è¿ç»­æ•°ä½æœ‰ 12â€¾\overline{12}12ï¼Œ23â€¾\overline{23}23ï¼Œ31â€¾\overline{31}31.

è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼

è¾“å‡ºä¸€è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ»¡è¶³é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚çš„æ•°çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

solution

æ°´æ•°ä½dpè®°å¾—åˆ¤å‰å¯¼0.

code

//è™½è¯´æ˜¯æ°´è´§ä½†è¦è®°å¾—åˆ¤å‰å¯¼0â€¦â€¦
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}

int le,ri,x,y;
int num[20],len;
int f[20][15][2][2];

int dfs(int pos,int pre,bool lim,bool has)
{
    if(!pos) return has&&(pre!=11);
    if(f[pos][pre][lim][has]!=-1)
        return f[pos][pre][lim][has];
    int Mval=9,res=0;
    if(lim) Mval=num[pos];
    for(int i=0;i<=Mval;i++)
        res+=dfs(pos-1,(!i&&pre==11)?11:i,lim&&(i==Mval),has||(i==y&&pre==x));
    return f[pos][pre][lim][has]=res;
}
int solve(int x)
{
    memset(num,0,sizeof(num));
    memset(f,-1,sizeof(f));
    len=0;
    while(x)
        num[++len]=x%10,x/=10;
    return dfs(len,11,1,0);
}

signed main()
{
    le=read(),ri=read(),x=read(),y=read();
    cout<<(ri-le+1-(solve(ri)-solve(le-1)))<<endl;

    return 0;
}

6.æ´›è°·P3544 BEZ-Minimalist Security

P3544

solution

è¿™ä¸ªé¢˜å¯ä»¥åƒå€ºåŠ¡æ¸…å•é‚£æ ·æ¯ä¸ªè¿é€šå—é€‰ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹è®¾ä¸ºxxx,ç„¶åé€šè¿‡è¾¹æƒæ±‚å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹çš„è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œæ¥ç€è¿›è¡Œæœ‰è§£æ— è§£åˆ¤æ–­ä¹‹ç±»çš„ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå¥‡ç¯åˆ™éœ€è¦xâˆˆ[l,r]x\in[l,r]xâˆˆ[l,r]ğŸ˜­lllå’Œrrråˆå§‹æ˜¯0å’Œvalèµ·å§‹ç‚¹val_{èµ·å§‹ç‚¹}valèµ·å§‹ç‚¹â€‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä»¤è¯¥è¿é€šå—å†…æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹ç­‰äº0å’Œvalèµ·å§‹ç‚¹val_{èµ·å§‹ç‚¹}valèµ·å§‹ç‚¹â€‹æ¥æ›´æ–°)

å¦‚æœæ˜¯å¶ç¯éœ€è¦å¸¸æ•°é¡¹ç›¸ç­‰å¦åˆ™æ— è§£ã€‚

code

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define MP make_pair
#define int long long
const int MAXN=500005;
const int MAXM=3000005;
using namespace std;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}

int n,m;
int per[MAXN],temp[MAXN];

int head[MAXN];
struct EDGE
{
    int from,to;
    int need;
    int next;
}edge[MAXM<<1];
int edge_cnt=1;
void add_edge(int fr,int to,int ned)
{
    edge[++edge_cnt].from=fr;
    edge[edge_cnt].to=to;
    edge[edge_cnt].need=ned;
    edge[edge_cnt].next=head[fr];
    head[fr]=edge_cnt;
}
int Minans,Maxans;

struct Stack
{
    int q[MAXN<<1],len;
    void push(int x) {q[++len]=x;}
    void pop() {len--;}
    int top() {return q[len];}
    int size() {return len;}
    bool empty() {return !len;}
    void clear() {len=0;}
}s;
bool vis[MAXN][2];//0æ˜¯æ­£ç³»æ•°,1æ˜¯è´Ÿç³»æ•°
int val[MAXN][2];//å¸¸æ•°é¡¹,æ³¨æ„è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ä»…ä»…æ ¹æ®é™åˆ¶æ¥çš„
void breakout()
{
    puts("NIE");
    exit(0);
}
inline void solve(int st)//å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªè¿é€šå—è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ
{
    queue<pii>q;
    s.clear();
    vis[st][0]=1,s.push(st);
    q.push(MP(st,0));
    while(q.size())
    {
        int x=q.front().first,col=q.front().second;
        q.pop();
        for(int i=head[x];i;i=edge[i].next)
        {
            int y=edge[i].to,z=edge[i].need;
            if(!vis[y][0]&&!vis[y][1])
                s.push(y);//åœ¨å½“å‰è¿é€šå—ä¸­
            if(vis[y][!col])
            {//ç‰¹åˆ¤,å¦‚æœå¯¹é¢å’Œå½“å‰ç‚¹ç³»æ•°èƒ½æ¶ˆå°±çœ‹æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¼šå‡ºç°æ— è§£
                if(val[y][col^1]+val[x][col]!=z)
                    breakout();
            }
            else
            {//æ›´æ–°å¯¹é¢ç‚¹
                vis[y][!col]=1,val[y][!col]=z-val[x][col];
                q.push(MP(y,!col));
            }
        }
    }

    int le=0,ri=per[st],sum=0,suM=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=s.size();i++)
    {
        int pt=s.q[i];//æ‰¾å‡ºè¿é€šå—ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹
        if(vis[pt][0])//0=x+b,per[st]=x+bæ¥æ›´æ–°
            le=max(le,-val[pt][0]),ri=min(ri,per[pt]-pt[val][0]);
        if(vis[pt][1])//0=-x+b,per[st]=-x+bæ¥æ›´æ–°
            le=max(le,val[pt][1]-per[pt]),ri=min(ri,val[pt][1]);
        if(vis[pt][0]&&vis[pt][1])//x+b1=-x+b2æ¥æ›´æ–°
        {
            if((val[pt][1]-val[pt][0])&1)
                breakout();//éæ•´æ•°è§£
            le=max(le,(val[pt][1]-val[pt][0])>>1);
            ri=min(ri,(val[pt][1]-val[pt][0])>>1);
        }
    }
    if(le>ri) breakout();
    for(int i=1;i<=s.size();i++)
    {
        int pt=s.q[i];
        if(vis[pt][0])//å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæå€¼ï¼ˆä»£å…¥å¼å­ï¼‰
            sum+=per[pt]-le-val[pt][0],suM+=per[pt]-ri-val[pt][0];
        else//å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæå€¼
            sum+=per[pt]+le-val[pt][1],suM+=per[pt]+ri-val[pt][1];
    }
    if(sum>suM) swap(sum,suM);
    Minans+=sum,Maxans+=suM;//æ›´æ–°ç­”æ¡ˆ
}

signed main()
{
    n=read(),m=read();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) per[i]=read();
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        int u=read(),v=read(),nd=read();
        add_edge(u,v,nd),add_edge(v,u,nd);
    }

    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(vis[i][0]||vis[i][1]) continue;
        solve(i);
    }

    printf("%lld %lld\n",Minans,Maxans);

    return 0;
}

åªå…”å­æ¯ä¸ªæœˆä¼šç¹æ®–å‡ºå¦ä¸€åªå…”å­ã€‚ä¹‹åæ¯åªå…”å­å‡ºç”Ÿåéƒ½æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸Šè§„åˆ™ç¹æ®–ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠæ¯ä¸ªæœˆçš„ å…”å­çš„æ•°é‡ä½œä¸ºæ•°åˆ—ä¸­çš„æ•°å°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•°åˆ—ã€‚ ç°åœ¨è‰åŸä¸Šæœ‰ nnn åªå…”å­æ’æˆä¸€æ’ï¼Œæ¯åªå…”å­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç¹æ®–èƒ½åŠ› aia_iaiâ€‹ã€‚

å° F æƒ³æŠŠè¿™äº›å…”å­åˆ†ç»„ï¼Œè¦æ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªç»„å†…çš„å…”å­å¿…é¡»æ˜¯è¿ç»­çš„ä¸€æ®µã€‚è€Œä¸”å› ä¸ºå…”å­ä»¬ä¸å¤ªå–œæ¬¢å…”å­æ•°åˆ—ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç»„å†…ä»»æ„ä¸¤åªå…” å­çš„ç¹æ®–èƒ½åŠ›çš„å’Œä¸èƒ½åœ¨å…”å­æ•°åˆ—ä¸­å‡ºç°ã€‚ ç°åœ¨å° F æƒ³è®©è¿™äº›å…”å­çš„åˆ†ç»„æ•°é‡å°½å¯èƒ½å°‘ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å…”å­å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œä»–ç®—ä¸è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ä»–æ‰¾åˆ°äº†ä½ ï¼Œ æƒ³è®©ä½ å‘Šè¯‰ä»–æœ€å°‘çš„åˆ†ç»„æ•°é‡æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ã€‚
1.2 input

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
const int MAXN=100005;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}

int n;
int a[MAXN];
int fib[60],len;

struct HashTable
{
    int head[MAXN],data_cnt=0;
    int mod=100000;
    struct node
    {
        int val;
        int next;
    }data[MAXN<<1];
    int get_key(int x) {return x%mod;}
    bool find(int val)
    {
        for(int i=head[get_key(val)];i;i=data[i].next)
        {
            if(data[i].val==val) return 1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
    void insert(int val)
    {
        int ke=get_key(val);
        data[++data_cnt].val=val;
        data[data_cnt].next=head[ke];
        head[ke]=data_cnt;
    }
    void clear()
    {
        for(int i=1;i<=data_cnt;i++)
        {
            head[get_key(data[i].val)]=0;
            data[i].val=data[i].next=0;
        }
        data_cnt=0;
    }
}HT;
int ans;

signed main()
{
    n=read();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) a[i]=read();

    fib[0]=fib[1]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<=50;i++)
    {
        fib[i]=fib[i-1]+fib[i-2],len=i;
        if(fib[i]>1e10) break;
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        int bpos=lower_bound(fib+1,fib+len+1,a[i])-fib;
        for(int j=bpos;j<=len;j++)
        {
            if(HT.find(fib[j]-a[i]))
                ans++,HT.clear();
        }
        HT.insert(a[i]);
    }
    ans++;

    printf("%lld\n",ans);

    return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
const int MAXN=100005;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}
inline void write(int x)
{
    short s[20],len=0;
    if(!x) putchar('0');
    if(x<0) putchar('-'),x=-x;
    while(x) s[++len]=x%10,x/=10;
    while(len) putchar('0'|s[len--]);
    putchar(10);
}

int n,m;
int a[MAXN];

//æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„ä¸»å¸­æ ‘æ˜¯å¯¹é¢˜è§£é‡Œé‚£ä¸ªcå¼€çš„,å³å°äºç­‰äºæŸä¸€ä¸ªå€¼çš„æ•°é‡å‡å»å¤§äºçš„
int cnt_node,root[MAXN];//ä¸»å¸­æ ‘
struct node
{
    int ls,rs;
    int cnt;
}tree[MAXN<<5];
inline void clearify()//æ¯æ¬¡çš„æ¸…ç©º
{
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) root[i]=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=cnt_node;i++)
        tree[i]={0,0,0};
    cnt_node=0;
}
inline int insert(int num,int l,int r,int val)//æ’å…¥
{
    int t=++cnt_node;
    tree[t]=tree[num],tree[t].cnt++;
    if(l==r) return t;
    int mid=(l+r)>>1;
    if(val<=mid) tree[t].ls=insert(tree[t].ls,l,mid,val);
    else tree[t].rs=insert(tree[t].rs,mid+1,r,val);
    return t;
}
inline int query(int u,int v,int L,int R,int l,int r)
{//å¤§å†™çš„æ˜¯çº¿æ®µæ ‘åŒºé—´å°å†™çš„æ˜¯è¯¢é—®åŒºé—´
    if(L==l&&R==r) return tree[v].cnt-tree[u].cnt;
    int mid=(L+R)>>1;
    if(r<=mid)
        return query(tree[u].ls,tree[v].ls,L,mid,l,r);
    if(l>mid) 
        return query(tree[u].rs,tree[v].rs,mid+1,R,l,r);
    else 
        return query(tree[u].ls,tree[v].ls,L,mid,l,mid)+query(tree[u].rs,tree[v].rs,mid+1,R,mid+1,r);
}
inline int solve(int va,int sl,int sr)
{//ä¸­ä½æ•°ä¸å¤§äºva,åŒºé—´é•¿åº¦åœ¨llå’Œlrä¹‹é—´
    root[1]=insert(root[1],0,n<<1,n);//åˆå§‹åŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºäº†åé¢äº§ç”Ÿç­”æ¡ˆ
    int ct=0,res=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)//æšä¸¾å³ç«¯ç‚¹
    {
        if(a[i]<=va) ct++;//é¢„å¤„ç†é¢˜è§£é‡Œé‚£ä¸ªc
        else ct--;
        root[i+1]=insert(root[i],0,n<<1,ct+n);//æ’åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®,ä¸ºäº†ä¸‹é¢å†™ç€æ–¹ä¾¿
        res+=query(root[max(i-sr,0ll)],root[max(i-sl+1,0ll)],0,n<<1,0,ct+n);
        //æŸ¥è¯¢å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹å¯ä»¥åœ¨çš„åŒºé—´é‡Œé¢çš„ç­”æ¡ˆ
    }
    clearify();
    return res;
}

signed main()
{
    n=read();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) a[i]=read();
    
    m=read();
    while(m--)
    {
        int vl=read(),vr=read(),sl=read(),sr=read();
        write(solve(vr,sl,sr)-solve(vl-1,sl,sr));//ç›´æ¥å¯¹äºä¸­ä½æ•°å°äºç­‰äºæŸä¸ªæ•°å‰ç¼€å’Œç›¸å‡
    }

    return 0;
}

using namespace std;
const int MAXN=2005;
inline int read()
{

int n,m,q;
struct TreeArray
{
    int a[MAXN][MAXN],lenx,leny;

    int lowbit(int x) {return x&-x;}
    void add(int x,int y,int adding)
    {
        for(int i=x;i<=lenx;i+=lowbit(i))
            for(int j=y;j<=leny;j+=lowbit(j))
                a[i][j]^=adding;
    }
    int query(int x,int y)
    {
        int res=0;
        for(int i=x;i;i-=lowbit(i))
            for(int j=y;j;j-=lowbit(j))
                res^=a[i][j];
        return res;
    }
}TA;
map<pii,int>v;//å‹ç¼©ç‚¹ä¹‹åç”¨pairå’Œmapè¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨

signed main()
{
    n=read(),m=read(),q=read();
    TA.init();
    while(q--)
    {
        int opt=read();
        int x1=read(),y1=read(),x2=read(),y2=read();
        if(opt==1)
        {
            int va=rand()*rand();
            v[MP(x1*m+y1,x2*m+y2)]=va;
            TA.add(x1,y1,va),TA.add(x2+1,y2+1,va);
            TA.add(x1,y2+1,va),TA.add(x2+1,y1,va);
        }
        if(opt==2)
        {
            int va=v[MP(x1*m+y1,x2*m+y2)];
            TA.add(x1,y1,va),TA.add(x2+1,y2+1,va);
            TA.add(x1,y2+1,va),TA.add(x2+1,y1,va);
        }
        if(opt==3)
            puts(TA.query(x1,y1)==TA.query(x2,y2)?"Yes":"No");
    }
    return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
const int MAXN=1000005;
inline int read()
{
    int weight=0,symbol=1;
    char in=getchar();
    while(!isdigit(in))
    {
        if(in=='-') symbol=-1;
        in=getchar();
    }
    while(isdigit(in))
    {
        weight=weight*10+in-'0';
        in=getchar();
    }
    return symbol*weight;
}
inline void write(int x)
{
    short s[20],len=0;
    if(!x) putchar('0');
    if(x<0) putchar('-'),x=-x;
    while(x) s[++len]=x%10,x/=10;
    while(len) putchar('0'|s[len--]);
    putchar(10);
}

int n,m;
int a[MAXN],temp[MAXN];

int fro[MAXN],fa[MAXN];//åˆå§‹æ•°ç»„,æ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œæ•°ç»„
inline int find(int x)
{
    if(x==fa[x]) return x;
    return fa[x]=find(fa[x]);
}
inline bool check(int lim)
{
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        fa[i]=fro[i],temp[i]=a[i];
    if(lim<find(n)) return 0;
    for(register int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        int tmp=lim,now=find(n);
        tmp-=now;
        while(tmp)
        {
            if(tmp<temp[now]) 
            {
                temp[now]-=tmp;
                break;
            }
            tmp-=temp[now],temp[now]=0,fa[now]=find(now-1);//èƒ½å¹²æ‰å½“å‰æ’çš„å·¥ä½œ
            now=find(now);//æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€æ’
            if(!now) return 1;
        }
        if(!find(n)) return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}

int ans;

signed main()
{
    n=read(),m=read();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) 
    {
        a[i]=read();
        if(a[i]) fro[i]=i;
        else fro[i]=i-1;
    }

    int le=0,ri=1e15;
    while(le<=ri)
    {
        int mid=(le+ri)>>1;
        if(check(mid)) ans=mid,ri=mid-1;
        else le=mid+1;
    }

    write(ans);
    
    return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
